programme.desc: CHI AL SHAQAB presented by Longines 2026, taking place from 18 to 22 February 2026, features world-class equestrian competition at the Al Shaqab venue in Doha. programme.title: Day 1 -CSI3* - Longines Global Tour 2026 – Doha Round
programme.desc: The Longines Global Champions Tour 2026 – Doha Round takes place from 4 to 7 March 2026, bringing together the world’s leading show jumping riders and elite horses at Al Shaqab. programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last three home league games against Chelsea, last winning more consecutively between 1990 and 1994. Chelsea are winless in their last eight Premier League games against Arsenal, their longest since a run of 19 between 1995 and 2005.

Real Betis vs Sevilla - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Real Betis Balompié have won their last two LaLiga matches against Sevilla FC and could achieve three successive victories for the first time in the history of the Seville derby in the top-flight. Sevilla have picked up points in 14 of their last 16 away games against Real Betis in LaLiga, scoring in their last six league visits to their arch-rivals' home ground – their second-best away scoring streak in the history of the Seville derby in the competition.

programme.desc: The Ultimate Pro Triathlon Tour. The 2025 T100 Triathlon World Tour takes the world's best pro triathletes on a globe-trotting adventure of 9 races as they fight it out across a season jam-packed with racing in iconic locations spanning April to December in the battle to be crowned T100 Triathlon World Champion.

programme.title: M1 - Day 1 - ATP 1000 BNP Paribas Open
programme.desc: Played at Indian Wells Tennis Garden, this ATP Masters 1000 features one of the slowest hard courts on tour, with a high bounce that neutralizes power and rewards heavy topspin and patience. Desert wind conditions and a 96-player draw make it a true endurance test over two weeks, often favoring strong returners and baseline grinders.

Desert wind conditions and a 96-player draw make it a true endurance test over two weeks, often favoring strong returners and baseline grinders.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Chelsea - English Premier League
programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last three home league games against Chelsea, last winning more consecutively between 1990 and 1994. Chelsea are winless in their last eight Premier League games against Arsenal, their longest since a run of 19 between 1995 and 2005.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Villarreal - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: FC Barcelona have lost two of their last four LaLiga matches against Villarreal CF, twice as many defeats as they suffered in their previous 29 encounters against them in the competition. programme.desc: FC Barcelona have lost two of their last four LaLiga matches against Villarreal CF, twice as many defeats as they suffered in their previous 29 encounters against them in the competition. programme.title: Leeds United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Leeds have lost each of their last five Premier League games against Man City, having lost just four of their first 16 against them in the competition. Man City have won their last two away league games against Leeds – only once have they won three consecutively, doing so in their first three visits to Elland Road between 1924 and 1928.

programme.title: Leeds United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Leeds have lost each of their last five Premier League games against Man City, having lost just four of their first 16 against them in the competition. programme.title: Manchester City vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Manchester City are unbeaten in their last 21 Premier League home games against Newcastle, winning each of the last 16. In English top-flight history, only Everton have had a longer winning home run against an opponent. Newcastle are looking to complete their first league double over Manchester City since 1983-84, and first in the top-flight since 1955-56. However, their 20 games at the Etihad Stadium is the most a team has played at a venue without ever winning in Premier League history.

programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur have won 16 of their last 21 Premier League matches against Crystal Palace, although they have lost two of their last three against the Eagles. programme.title: Real Madrid vs Getafe - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 21 of their last 24 matches against Getafe in LaLiga, scoring a total of 55 goals and conceding just 10 during this period. Getafe have only picked up points in two of their 20 away matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga. programme.title: Le Havre vs Paris Saint-Germain - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 24
programme.desc: Le Havre have lost nine of their last 10 Ligue 1 matches against Paris SG, which is only one fewer than in their first 23 encounters. Paris SG are the team Le Havre have hosted most often in the 21st century in all competitions while losing 100% of these matches.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Villarreal - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: FC Barcelona have lost two of their last four LaLiga matches against Villarreal CF, twice as many defeats as they suffered in their previous 29 encounters against them in the competition. At home, Barcelona have lost three of their last four matches against Villarreal in LaLiga, including the last two, making them the opponent against whom they have suffered the most home defeats in the competition since 2021/22.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Getafe - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Real Madrid have won 21 of their last 24 matches against Getafe in LaLiga, scoring a total of 55 goals and conceding just 10 during this period. Getafe have only picked up points in two of their 20 away matches against Real Madrid in LaLiga. Bernd Schuster was in the dugout for both of these games, a 1-1 draw in March 2007 as Getafe coach and a 0-1 win in February 2008 as Real Madrid coach.

programme.title: Liverpool vs West Ham United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 28 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 19 Premier League games against West Ham, winning seven of the last eight since a 3-2 away loss in November 2021. West Ham have won just one of their last 52 away league games against Liverpool, beating them 3-0 in August 2015 under Slaven Bilic.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Chelsea - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 28 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Arsenal have won their last three home league games against Chelsea, last winning more consecutively between 1990 and 1994. Chelsea are winless in their last eight Premier League games against Arsenal, their longest since a run of 19 between 1995 and 2005.

Lille vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 24
programme.desc: Lille have lost just two of their last 33 Ligue 1 matches against FC Nantes : a 1-0 home defeat in September 2015 and in Nantes in March 2025. Lille have not lost any of their last 10 home games against Nantes in all competitions, conceding only five goals in these matches. Indeed, Les Dogues have not conceded more than one goal at home against the Canaries since 1996.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs Olympique Lyonnais - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 24
programme.desc: There have been 40 draws between Marseille and Lyon in Ligue 1, with only Marseille-Bordeaux seeing a greater number of draws in the history of the league. However, the last draw between these two teams in the competition was in the 2020-21 season. Marseille have won each of their last three home games against Lyon in Ligue 1, as many as in their previous 14. OM could record four consecutive home wins against Les Gones for the third time, after 1952-1956 and 1993-1997.

programme.title: Olympique Marseille vs Olympique Lyonnais - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 24
programme.desc: There have been 40 draws between Marseille and Lyon in Ligue 1, with only Marseille-Bordeaux seeing a greater number of draws in the history of the league. OM could record four consecutive home wins against Les Gones for the third time, after 1952-1956 and 1993-1997.

programme.desc: Real Betis Balompié have won their last two LaLiga matches against Sevilla FC and could achieve three successive victories for the first time in the history of the Seville derby in the top-flight. programme.title: Valencia vs Osasuna - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 26
programme.desc: Valencia have failed to win any of their last three LaLiga games against Osasuna, since a 0-1 victory at El Sadar in April 2024; it's their worst winless run against them in the competition since January 2012. programme.title: Cesson-Rennes vs Chambery - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: M1 - Day 1 - ATP 1000 BNP Paribas Open
programme.desc: Played at Indian Wells Tennis Garden, this ATP Masters 1000 features one of the slowest hard courts on tour, with a high bounce that neutralizes power and rewards heavy topspin and patience. Desert wind conditions and a 96-player draw make it a true endurance test over two weeks, often favoring strong returners and baseline grinders.

programme.title: Main Race - Moto 3 - Thailand Round
programme.desc: MotoGP heads to Thailand at the Chang International Circuit in Buriram, a track defined by long straights, heavy braking zones, and intense heat. The stop-start layout challenges tyre management and rider endurance, while strong acceleration out of slow corners is crucial. Local support and Honda’s home presence add extra intensity to this demanding round.

Paris vs Aix - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al-Gharafa vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W17
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: FC Lorient vs OGC Nice - French Cup - 2025/26 - Quarter Finals
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the Coupe de France, also referred to as the French Cup, is the premier knockout cup competition in French football organised by the French Football Federation (FF). The winner qualifies for the group stage of the UEFA Europa League and a place in the Trophée des Champions. Current champions are Paris saint Germain.
